attributes.action: Home self testing kits for coronavirus!
attributes.additional_details: It would put people’s mind at ease who are showing symptoms or who can’t get out and for people who are also high risk
attributes.background: Send out or make it easier for people to request hone testing kits for coronavirus, would help put less strain on nhs

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301354

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
